item.title: Optical Illusion: a non straight line of code?
item.dc:creator: tobi
item.description: A bit of fun: Look at this, a Screenshot I took ages ago and just found to share. It’s taken from a piece of code I was writing within jEdit by that time. It totally looks like the two long line go up, but if you apply a ruler, you see, it’s indeed straight: A […]
item.content:encoded:
A bit of fun: Look at this, a Screenshot I took ages ago and just found to share. It’s taken from a piece of code I was writing within jEdit by that time.

It totally looks like the two long line go up, but if you apply a ruler, you see, it’s indeed straight:

A optical Illusion – weird, right?

item.title: Arduion has arrived
item.dc:creator: admin
item.description: Here it is! Yeah, finally my Arduino (ordered at Watterott) has been delivered. Can’t wait to get my hands on it. Stay tuned for future reports! All about this great ‘toy’ here: www.arduino.cc
item.content:encoded:
Here it is! Yeah, finally my Arduino (ordered at Watterott) has been delivered. Can’t wait to get my hands on it. Stay tuned for future reports!

All about this great ‘toy’ here: www.arduino.cc
